item.description:
You may have heard the rumors floating around of an Aussie meat pie shop coming to Boston or you may have tried Sammy's amazing pies or sausage rolls at the Grand Final parties.

As of next week KO Catering and Pies will be open for business and Sammy has invited us all down in force for Tuesday the 2nd of Nov from 5pm onwards.

He has done an absolutely fantastic job in setting this all up and it would be great for us to get down and show some support, eat a pie or two and have a yarn.

This is a HUGE event for us Aussies in Boston. We have all been waiting way too long for a fresh pie right on our doorstep!

Hope to see you all there.......check out the links below
www.kocateringandpies.com
http://news.bostonher...

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: AUSSIE MEAT PIES FINALLY COME TO BOSTON!!!
